about_the_game:
《Legend of Hidden Flows》It is a sandbox Immortal cultivation game that combines strategy card construction, open world ,and role-playing.

In this game, there is a completely open world, and every restart is a brand new map. Since you were born, you have to start simulating a new life.

You will grow from an unknown person. On the way to growth, you will encounter many strange people, and you can socialize with them or fight decisively.

You can collect the world's spiritual herbs and refine miraculous elixirs and divine medicines; You can also collect legendary minerals, cast epic equipment, and become a legend.

There are many forces in this world, and various conflicts often arise between them. You can join them to serve the faction, or you can be arrogant without any sect.

You can experience a different life in this world.
